```if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then
        # Mac OSX
        realpath() {
             [[ $1 = /* ]] && echo "$1" || echo "$PWD/${1#./}"
        }

        KOKU_SECRETS=$(realpath "$0")/e2e-secrets.yml
fi```
